explains: vt. 教育；谆谆教诲；教授；反复灌输

sentences.en: Great care was taken to inculcate the values of nationhood and family.
sentences.cn: 反复灌输民族和家庭理念被大力提倡。

sentences.en: We have tried to inculcate a feeling of citizenship in youngsters.
sentences.cn: 我们试图向年轻人灌输公民意识。

sentences.en: The aim is to inculcate businesspeople with an appreciation of different cultures.
sentences.cn: 其目的是教导商界人员学会欣赏不同的文化。
